Package controller

Class SlideShowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SlideShowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class SlideShowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Logic for automatic slideshow screen. Displays new photo every 30 seconds
    Author:
    alh220, jmuccino

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) int index
      Index of photo in slideshow must be declared globally in order to be changed.
      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView photoDisplay
      ImageView that holds current photo in slideshow.

        public void close​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL arg0,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        Initial code called on load of screen. Sets timer to switch out picture every 3 seconds using Timer and TimerTask.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
